NamTuLiem.Name: DYM MEDICAL CENTER HANOI
NamTuLiem.Address: Basement B1, Epic Tower, Lane 19 Duy Tan, My Dinh 2 Ward, Nam Tu Liem District, Hanoi City, Vietnam

Hero.Title: DYM MEDICAL CENTER VIETNAM
Hero.P1: Our clinic is a medical institution in Vietnam operated by a Japanese company. We open 3 clinics, Ho Chi Minh city District 1, District 7, Hanoi City District Nam Tu Liem.
Hero.P2: Our Japanese-speaking staff will be very attentive to your needs. You can understand your symptoms and treatment details without worrying about the language barrier.
Hero.P3: We believe that we are a reassuring presence for our patients. We want to be a reassuring presence for our patient. We provide an environment where patients can overcome language barriers and receive treatment with peace of mind.

Footer.CompanyName: DYM MEDICAL CENTER VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED
Footer.BRC: Business registration certificate No. 0316060982, first registered on November 12, 2019, issued by the Department of Planning and Investment of Ho Chi Minh City.
Footer.OperateLicense: Medical examination and treatment operation license No. 08174/HCM-GPHD issued by Ho Chi Minh City Department of Health on August 5, 2020.
